Description: Egypt, view of Colossus of Memnon. Giant statue representing seated adult male. Small group of adult males with saddled horses at foot of figure. Rural setting, hills in background. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Circumstances: The Imperial War Museum holds photographs from the same collection with a more military content - see [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
